content.rendered:
Our Practices

Maple Education Canada Inc. offers quality services in a conscientious, diligent and efficient manner. For over a decade, we have made it our business to provide valuable immigration services to our clients. We offer immigration advice and make sure to follow through with our clients’ application processes. From filling the first form to the stage where they are welcomed by our team on Canadian soil. We will be there every step of the way. We are proud to say that we have worked hand in hand with our clients through their application processes and have a very high success rate.

Our services include the following:

Speedy Admission Processing

We have built solid working relationships with our affiliate schools; thus, we are able to offer prospective students a speedy application process into any of our top affiliate institutions.

Apply Now

Immigration Application

We guide our clients through the process of visa documentation, in order to increase the chances of getting an approval.

Apply Now

Study Permit Application

After securing admission into a Canadian institution, Maple Education Canada Inc can assist you with study permit application. To ensure quality documentation, we work with the assistance of 4 certified Canadian Immigration Consultants and they provide our clients with useful and updated information on immigration information. If you have an admission offer, please send an email with your offer letter to admissions@mapleeducation.ca to request for our visa application contract.

Apply Now

Visitors Visa Application

We assist our clients with documentation and application for temporary residence visa.

Email Us
Apply Now

Academic Counseling

We offer educational counseling to all students. We explain how the Canadian education system works and we match their qualification to a suitable program. This will help them in navigating the system successfully.

Learn More
Email Us

Flight Booking and Chaperoning

We make flight arrangements for our clients and offer chaperoned travelling services to all of our clients who wish to take advantage of this service, giving parents the peace of mind that comes with the knowledge that their children/wards are being accompanied on the flight by a responsible adult.

Residence Facility

We provide residence facilities to our students studying in Fort St. John, British Columbia. Students who reside in our residence facility are closely supervised. The result – 90% of our students graduate with top grades and obtain scholarships to top Canadian Universities.

Document Renewal Support

We provide support to students throughout the duration of their studies in Canada with study permit renewals, work permit, Permanent Residence application, at a token. Send us an email at immigration@mapleeducation.ca or canada@mapleeducation.ca 

Orientation and Group Tours

Upon arrival in Canada, our clients are greeted and briefed by our Canadian team in our specialized orientation program. They are equipped with tools and necessary information for a smooth transition into life in Canada.

Contact us

What Clients say

 5/5
I Just want to say a big thank you to Maple Education team especially Mr Tope Olukoya and Abdulbaqi’s Visa Officer, Mrs Tosan for their patience during my son’s visa processing. Maple is indeed a worthy consulting firm. Keep the good work. Well-done Team!! I am indeed a proud Maple parent.
Abdulbaqi Haruna
We got to know Maple Education Canada through a friend who encouraged us to use their services. When we got to Maple Education, the things we thought were difficult to achieve especially the student visa were very easy and impressing. Maple is wonderful and from experience- very credible! We have referred over 5 people to Maple because of the result we got and we won’t stop spreading the Maple gospel. Thanks to the entire team.
Mr. and Mrs. Hassan.
My son Chidera Emekaduome is currently studying Landscape Architecture at the University of Manitoba through Maple Education services. Also, my son Robert has joined his brother at the University of Manitoba. I am happy with Maple Education because they have done so well and I am also proud to be a Maple parent.
Mrs Onyenchi Emekaduome
I am grateful for being awarded a scholarship of $1,250.00 from BCCIE as the best International student in British Columbia, I am most grateful to Maple Education for their services and their assistance to realizing my dreams in Canada. They are always there to allay my fears, provide very strong moral support and guidance to me at their homestay in Canada. In my personal opinion.
Derin Odunbanjo
In 2019, My mum and I visited Maple Education for my admission processing to Great Lakes College. They genuinely and happily assisted me throughout my admission and visa process till I got to Canada. I also benefited from the sibling discount while engaging their services. I will recommend Maple Education anytime for a seamless customer experience
Oluwatobi Aderibigbe
The first time Maple processed my application for a visitor’s visa they ensured we put in the best file possible. After my application was submitted, I was given 1 year visiting visa and I traveled to Canada in 2016. My mom was satisfied with Maple's services. This year, we came to Maple to renew our visas and within a month I was given 4 years visiting visa. Thank you, Maple.
Adeleke Ademuyiwa
My journey in the Canadian education system was facilitated by Maple Education Canada Inc and it began in Grande Prairie Regional College. I was a restless 16 years old with big dreams about public service both in Nigeria and globally. At the University of Alberta where I completed my first degree, I found the learning environment to be lively and many teachers were willing to provide a platform for students to use their lived experiences as a vehicle for learning. After my first degree, I worked for the government of Alberta as a Research Analyst Intern for two years and then moved back to Nigeria but later returned to Canada to pursue a Master’s degree in Educational Administration. Currently, I am a PhD candidate at the University of Toronto.
Chizoba Imoka Wiseman
Previous
Next
